body.p: The Wine development release 1.5.11 is now available.

What's new in this release:
Multi-channel support in the ALSA driver.
Removal of the big X11 lock.
Support for pair positioning adjustments in Uniscribe.
More I/O stream implementations in the C++ runtime.
Various bug fixes.

p.p: The source is available now. Binary packages are in the process of being built, and will appear soon at their respective download locations.
